Hey this is a test on 2/17/2026!

First attempt at pulling NEON Data: 2/17
```{r}
#Pull data
discharge <- "DP4.00130.001"

#Select sites and dates *DATES SHOULD BE REEVALUATED
my_sites <- c("BIGC", "TECR")
start_date <- "2018-11"
end_date <- "2022-12"

#Pull
list2env((loadByProduct(dpID = discharge, 
                        site = my_sites, 
                        include.provisional = FALSE,
                        startdate = start_date,
                        enddate = end_date)),
         .GlobalEnv)
```

```{r}
#Pull data from	"Fish electrofishing, gill netting, and fyke netting counts"
fish <- "DP1.20107.001"

#Select sites and dates

                        site = my_sites, 
                        include.provisional = FALSE,
                        startdate = start_date,
                        enddate = end_date)),
         .GlobalEnv)
```
